conclusion: Analyze the image and understand the flow of liquid through the baffles.
Arrows labeled A, B, C, and D indicate the direction of flow.
Predict which container (E or F) the liquid will flow into after passing through the baffles.
Arrows A, B, C, and D are pointing towards different directions.
The liquid will flow from A to E, from B to F, from C to D, and from D to E.
Match the direction of the arrows with the container E or F.
The liquid will flow into container E after passing through the baffles.
